title: No rng just skill in TFT
body:
https://i.ibb.co/D8JK6wZ/01.png
This guy finish with 100 hp. Because he was 14 items and 4 gold champs, he took items from EVERY minion round. Ofc its just his skill. GG riot.

replies.body: The items part is stupid. But the 3 stars thing is reasonably obtainable cuz he prolly rerolled every round up to level 6 without spending anything on xp (common gs strat rn). Those are all 1 and 2 cost units he has 3 stars of.

> [{quoted}](name=Z3Sleepier,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BF76ko7E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-26T20:29:02.651+0000)
>
> The items part is stupid. But the 3 stars thing is reasonably obtainable cuz he prolly rerolled every round up to level 6 without spending anything on xp (common gs strat rn). Those are all 1 and 2 cost units he has 3 stars of.

there is nothing reasonable about this game mode, it favors certain players and completely wastes the fucking time of everyone else.  Fuck rito, ever since Mark Merril sold it to Fuckface China they shit all over the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Just RednecK,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BF76ko7E,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-07-26T20:01:24.975+0000)
>
> https://i.ibb.co/D8JK6wZ/01.png
> This guy finish with 100 hp. Because he was 14 items and 4 gold champs, he took items from EVERY minion round. Ofc its just his skill. GG riot.



The game is mostly skill.. he went slingers with I assume on hit items and rocked everyone.

You don't need to be first to win, top 4 is all you need, yeah he rocked but that didn't mean you couldn't get top 4.

If this game was only RNG then how are people climbing Elo? They just too lucky every game?

How was scarra in masters then on another account he is going to masters again? He's just THAT lucky every game??

Not to be rude but typically the people who make these kind of posts are just bad at the game and refuse to believe it's them, so they need to blame it on an outside force that's making them lose, like rng.

Your decisions matter in the game, you can literally get the worst RNG and win a top 4 spot...

I was yordles and i was tris lvl2 on board + tris lvl2 on back (its 6 units). But this guy was lvl3 tris + lvl3 luc at fkin 2nd carousele PLUS he was cursed blade, red buff and firecannon on tris in same round. Explain me this mr. Skill game. Its rng as fuck. And up Elo in tft is nothing hard for 1st place u have rank up for 8 u lose only 20 or less lp. Do u need calculator to understand why ppl who goes up mostly LUCKY not skilled?

> [{quoted}](name=Just RednecK,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BF76ko7E,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-07-26T20:42:25.921+0000)
>
> I was yordles and i was tris lvl2 on board + tris lvl2 on back (its 6 units). But this guy was lvl3 tris + lvl3 luc at fkin 2nd carousele PLUS he was cursed blade, red buff and firecannon on tris in same round. Explain me this mr. Skill game. Its rng as fuck. And up Elo in tft is nothing hard for 1st place u have rank up for 8 u lose only 20 or less lp. Do u need calculator to understand why ppl who goes up mostly LUCKY not skilled?

Exaclty what was just posted.

Slingers on hit is good but not alone.

You could of gotten top 4. This game is more about skill than rng. Yes he had good items but I bet you had items too, if you're not planning right that's on you.

He had 3 star units all of which are only 1 and 3 cost units, hate to tell you this but in most games those same units always hit 3 stars. It's common for those units.

Watch some videos and streamers to learn how to play the game, that guy had a great economy while he was #1 because he doesn't need to reroll as you shouldn't be trolling really, he saved up to finish his 3 star units. Even then it was meh,he didn't even get an 8th unit.

> [{quoted}](name=Just RednecK,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BF76ko7E,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-07-26T20:42:25.921+0000)
>
> I was yordles and i was tris lvl2 on board + tris lvl2 on back (its 6 units). But this guy was lvl3 tris + lvl3 luc at fkin 2nd carousele PLUS he was cursed blade, red buff and firecannon on tris in same round. Explain me this mr. Skill game. Its rng as fuck. And up Elo in tft is nothing hard for 1st place u have rank up for 8 u lose only 20 or less lp. Do u need calculator to understand why ppl who goes up mostly LUCKY not skilled?

Get to plat-master and then you can start talking about lp gains and losses. Yes in iron-gold you can jump quick. In diamond you get 36 lp for first 20 something for 2nd  and 38-56 minus for anything under 5th.

> [{quoted}](name=Just RednecK,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BF76ko7E,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-07-26T20:01:24.975+0000)
>
> https://i.ibb.co/D8JK6wZ/01.png
> This guy finish with 100 hp. Because he was 14 items and 4 gold champs, he took items from EVERY minion round. Ofc its just his skill. GG riot.

If he got the four max from the start 1 from carousal, 1 from gromp (max), 1 from carousal,  2 from wolves (max), 1 from carousal, and 2 from chickens (max), 1 from carousal He would still only have 13 items pre-dragon. 

On top of that his comp is garbage (Gunslinger pirate and only 7 champs should get torched by yordle sorcs), the fact that you didn't win was positioning and item choices not his RNG.

Garbage? He was 3star tris with {{item:3137}} {{item:3094}} and red buff, he was 3star lucian with {{item:3124}} {{item:3748}}  {{item:3137}} 3star pyke with cancer{{item:3161}} No 7-8 or 9 champ comp can't kill it PLUS 3star graves. Don't tell me about "you didn't win was positioning and item choices not his RNG". He was on luck from start to end of this game. 14 fakin items before dragon.

> [{quoted}](name=Just RednecK,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BF76ko7E,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-07-26T21:32:50.080+0000)
>
> Garbage? He was 3star tris with {{item:3137}} {{item:3094}} and red buff, he was 3star lucian with {{item:3124}} {{item:3748}}  {{item:3137}} 3star pyke with cancer{{item:3161}} No 7-8 or 9 champ comp can't kill it PLUS 3star graves. Don't tell me about "you didn't win was positioning and item choices not his RNG". He was on luck from start to end of this game. 14 fakin items before dragon.



You still could of places top 4..that's the point....

You might not be #1 but top 4 is always doable.
